trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about an event across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 구성 요소는 응용 프로그램 도메인 및 프로세스 경계는 이벤트에 대 한 정보에 액세스 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 계약을 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An IRemoteEventInfoContract provides information about an event of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 원격 개체의 이벤트에 대 한 정보를 제공 하는 한 IRemoteEventInfoContract는 <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>인터페이스.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>

trans-unit.source: To access one or more events of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: 원격 개체의 하나 이상의 이벤트에 액세스 하려면 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>가져올 메서드를 한 <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>원격 개체의 형식을 나타내는.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기를 추가 하는 데 사용 된 메서드를 반환 합니다.이 이벤트에 대리자 <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> 식별 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To add a delegate to the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that GetAddMethod returns.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트에 대리자를 추가 하려면 호출의 <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>의 메서드는 <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract>GetAddMethod 반환 하는.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that represents the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> </xref> 는 이벤트 처리기를 추가 하는 데 사용 된 메서드를 나타내는 이벤트에이 대리자 <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> 식별 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트에 대 한 정보를 반환 합니다.이 <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> 식별 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData> structure includes the name of the event and the type that declares the event.
trans-unit.target: 제공한 정보는 <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData>구조 이벤트 및 이벤트를 선언 하는 형식의 이름이 포함 됩니다.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData"></xref> that provides information about the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData"> </xref> 이벤트에 대 한 정보를 제공 하는이 <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> 식별 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기를 제거 하는 데 사용 된 메서드를 반환 합니다.이 이벤트에서 위임 <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> 식별 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To remove a delegate from the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that GetRemoveMethod returns.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트의 대리자를 제거 하려면 호출의 <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>의 메서드는 <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract>GetRemoveMethod 반환 하는.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that represents the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> </xref> 는 이벤트 처리기를 제거 하는 데 사용 된 메서드를 나타내는 이벤트에서이 위임 <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> 식별 합니다.
